extractFactDictList.question: Globular clusters can be observed in what galaxies?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Globular clusters can be observed in many different galaxies, including our own Milky Way.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the name of the galaxies that contain the Large Magellanic Cloud?
extractFactDictList.sentence: They are also found in other galaxies, such as the Andromeda Galaxy and the Large Magellanic Cloud.
